titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rush Rhees, 8. 12. 1948
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der ÖNB (Autogr. 1286/19-7); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Thanks for your letter of Nov. 28th. I'm delighted to hear that you're thinking of coming & so, by the way, is Drury. ‒ Please let me know as soon as you can what day you're arriving, & eventually also what time. ‒ I can still work moderately well & that, on the whole, makes me feel well (better than my work is): I'll probably not be much good at discussion, but I hope that won't deterr? you.
I shan't write more today as I hope I'll soon be able to say it.
